name: Last Boss -9x9 Action Battle
description:
9x9 Action Battle

This is an arcade shooter game.
The player has two actions.
These are attack and evasion.
Avoid various attacks from the boss and defeat the boss.
Please defeat four bosses.
Then you should be able to meet the true boss.

Features of the game:
  • Easy operation
  • Unique and strong Boss
  • can challenge as many times as you like

Operation explanation:
  • right click:Attack
  • left click:Evasion
  • AWSD Key:Move
